articles.author: Foo Yun Chee
articles.title: Microsoft singles out Google's competitive edge in generative AI - Reuters
articles.description: Alphabet unit Google enjoys a competitive edge in generative artificial intelligence due to its trove of data and AI-optimised chips, Microsoft has told EU antitrust regulators, underscoring the rivalry between the two tech giants.
